results.title: Live Laugh Love
results.description:
This gorgeous candle is a reminder to Live, because you have to and do it to the fullest, Laugh, because it makes living easy, Love, because it makes us feel alive. This candle makes a great gift for a loved one or gift for yourself. 

We have 10 wonderful scents to choose from; simply select your favourite, sit back and enjoy the 45+ hours of burn time from this lux candle.

[ PRODUCT FEATURES ]

❤︎ 260 grams: 81mm wide, 100mm high
❤︎ Matching box: 94mm wide, 118mm high
❤︎ Burn time of 45+ hours 
❤︎ 100% soy wax, cotton wick  
❤︎ Australian made fragrances

[ FRAGRANCE DESCRIPTIONS ]

➸ CLASSICS COLLECTION
❤︎ Clarity | Very Vanilla: Like a favourite old sweater, we slip into the comfort of vanilla year after year. Our Clarity handmade soy candle adds a touch of cream to classic vanilla to create a more indulgent vanilla scent. Vanilla’s versatility lends itself to its timeless status; with one scent you can relax, allure, or simply create a warm welcome for guests.
❤︎ Luscious | Vanilla Caramel: All you need is a delectable scent and the right mindset to feel like you’re living in the lap of luxury. Our Luscious handmade soy candle features notes of sweet and buttery caramel balanced with rich, creamy vanilla, coconut, and tonka bean. This luscious scent brings the perfect blend of sophistication and warmth to your delightful space.
❤︎ Balance | Black Raspberry & Vanilla: Work, errands, friends, family. There are only so many hours in a day, but it’s important to take a deep breath - a moment for yourself. Our Balance handmade soy candle features bright, fruity blackberry and raspberry in perfect harmony with pretty white floral notes, creamy vanilla, and a subtle musk. Put the world on pause, if only for just a Moment, with this beautiful, balanced scent.
❤︎ Relaxation | Lime Coconut: Sit back, relax, and let your mind take you to some place far, far away. Our Relaxation handmade soy candle is ready to take you away with a tantalising fusion of fresh coconut and lime blended with invigorating verbena and luscious vanilla. Inspire all of the indulgence of a tropical cocktail with this reinvigorated classic.
❤︎ Restoration | Fresh Pine, Eucalyptus & Lemon: City life may be exciting, but there's always moments that we feel called to return to our roots. Our Restoration hand poured soy candle balances bright lemon with notes of fresh pine and eucalyptus. Take a walk on the wild side without leaving home.
➸ LUX RANGE
❤︎ Indulgence | Almond Vanilla: It’s time to discover the luxury that simplicity can bring. Our Indulgence handmade soy candle features the creamy scents of vanilla and milk blended with sweet almond and indulgent caramel. The subtle, sophisticated scent brings a certain warmth to your light, breezy space.
❤︎ Elegance | Bamboo & White Lily: Every day deserves something a little special. Creating a special moment can be as simple as lighting a candle. Our Elegance handmade soy candle features the intense but elegant white lily paired with the clean, green scent of bamboo. Bring a touch of the exceptional to everyday with this light but lingering floral scent. 
❤︎ Vibrancy | Lime, Basil & Mandarin: The right scent can help you begin every day with a clear mind and clear intentions. Our Vibrancy hand poured soy candle brightens and energizes your day with a perfect blend of fresh, zesty notes of lime and mandarin and undertones of herbaceous basil. With its crisp, clean scent there’s no better way to invigorate your space and focus your mind. 
❤︎ Bliss | Lychee & Guava Sorbet: No need to book a first-class ticket across the world to indulge in the vibrant fragrance of tropical fruits. Our Bliss hand poured soy candle features the bright scents of lychee fruit and mixed berries balanced with tart guava sorbet and lime peel; a touch of vanilla creates a subtle richness. Breathe new, brilliant life into dark rooms and dark days with this uplifting scent. 
❤︎ Enchantment | Patchouli, Amber & Incense: Sometimes you want something a little more sultry than fresh cut roses. Our Enchantment handmade soy candle calls upon warm notes of amber, incense, and a touch of patchouli to create an alluring, sophisticated scent. This complex but inviting scent evokes an air of mystery certain to enthrall all who enter your castle. 

——————————
We love conversing with our customers so please contact us with any questions.

Kindest Regards,
BellaScentedCandles.Etsy.com
© Bella Scented Candles, Copyright 2016

results.title: Handmade Cork Leather Bracelet, Unique Interchangeable Snap Jewelry Bracelet, Charm Bracelet, Eco Friendly, Snap Button, Noosa
results.description:
You'll love the feel of this soft cork bracelet against your skin. The natural cork has an almost suede-like feel to it and is so lightweight, you'll barely notice it on your wrist. What makes my handmade cuff bracelets unique and one-of-a-kind is that I've inserted a snap base in the center of the cork strap cuff wrap, which holds interchangeable 18-20mm snap charm buttons. I fell in love with snap charm jewelry about a year ago when I first discovered them. They're so awesome and my jewelry pieces never go out of style. I'm constantly changing out the snap charm button to complement what I'm wearing or whatever my mood just so happens to be that day. These silver color snap charms are sure to delight. My handmade cork leather bracelets won't get boring over time, just switch out the interchangeable snap and voila! you have a new piece of jewelry. These unique bracelets are made with your choice of either a 2-snap closure or magnetic closure. Custom sizing available upon request. 

1”width x 7.5” length

All of the cork I use in my handmade jewelry and various cork products is imported directly from Portugal, home of the Cork Oak tree. Cork is environmentally friendly, lightweight, durable, soft, and a vegan option to leather. Check out the various snap charms I am continually adding to my shop.

Your custom handmade cork bracelet comes with an interchangeable 18-20mm snap charm of your choice: Love, Happy Camper, Heart, I Love Football, Crown, and Live Laugh Love snap charm. You can even choose another 18mm snap adornment that is listed in my shop. I have a variety of 18mm snap button charms available. Please leave a note if you prefer a different snap.

Custom Sizing Available Upon Request


WARNING:  CHOKING HAZARD - Small Parts

Snap Charm Decoration and Jewelry Products are NOT intended for children. These snap charm decorative and jewelry items contain small parts and are for decoration and fashion only.  These are are not toys.

results.title: Genuine Leather Bracelet Laser Engraved Quote quotes Personalized Customized Personal Custom Leather Wrap Cuff Wide Couples Gift B006
results.description:
Double strand wrap leather bracelet, made of high quality genuine leather. Wraps two times around the wrist to create a modern urban look. Beautiful natural colors. Optional metal charm buckle which says "Live Laugh Love." The words on the charm cannot be customized. 

It's a simple, yet modern urban look. Adjustable to fit wrist sizes from roughly 5 to 7.5 inches (13 to 19 cm).  Total length = 16.5", Width = 1/2" 

You can have any saying you want engraved on this bracelet. Popular requests include names, places, religious quotes, famous quotes... whatever you want! We can also do different languages. This is a wonderful personalized gift for someone you love, including yourself. The laser engraver works by burning the surface of the item. Therefore, the engraving will be very subtle on the darker colors, and stands out best on the Caramel Tan, Berry Pink, Cracked White, and Cracked Teal. 

Our Cracked colors are made from a flexible split leather, and are finished with a crackly color paint on the outside. All other colors are made from vegetable-tanned leather. 

{{ How to Order }} We have three standard options: #A) The word "Love" in different languages. #B) The quote: You can't get to where you are except for where you've been. Love the life you live. Live the life you love. #C) If you want to engrave your own personalized quote: The bracelet will fit a maximum of about 90 characters (spaces included) per strand. That is 180 characters total. Double check that spelling, punctuation, and spaces are EXACTLY how you want them, because we copy and paste from your note. Unless otherwise requested, your message will only be engraved one time on the bracelet, and the phrase will not be repeated

results.title: Gaston’s Gym Magical Shirt Adult and Youth Sizes Family Vacation
results.description:
Hi! Thank you so much for checking out our Etsy shop. Below we have all of our sizing information and shop policy. Please carefully check sizing information and color selections because returns will not be permitted due to the custom nature of our items. With that being said – we are here to answer any and all questions you may have before placing your order so the product that you receive is exactly what you wanted. Please don’t hesitate to send us a message and we will respond in a timely manner.

We do our best to have all orders made and shipped either same day or within 24 hours. We make daily trips to the post office to ensure that your items are being shipped in a timely fashion. Please note that if you have a special request or personalization option added to your item – we will message you to confirm what we are going to make is what you requested. We want to make sure that you’re satisfied with what you’re ordering before we print your shipping label.

Note: If you add a personalization option – we like to get confirmation within 24 hours so if you do not respond to our message we will move forward and make it to our best interpretation of your request.

Vinyl Colors: Royal Blue, Sky Blue, Red, Rose Gold, Green, Teal, Hot Pink, Orange, Black, White, Gold, Silver, Maroon, Yellow Gold, Lime Green, and Purple.

If there is a vinyl color that you would like that you don’t see listed please send us a message. We typically have samples on hand which should give us enough to make whichever design you would like.

AVAILABLE SHIRT STYLES:
Please Note: In the rare occurrence that we run out of a specific t-shirt, a suitable replacement of an equal or better brand (same color) will be provided in exchange. It is a difficult time for our t-shirt provider as they can not guarantee every style we list. We will absolutely do our best to accommodate you.  

Adult Unisex: Bella + Canvas

100% Ring Spun Cotton (White, Black, True Royal, Poppy Red, Mint, Columbia Blue, Soft Pink, Mauve)

90% Cotton/10% Polyester (Athletic Heather Grey)

52% Cotton/48% Polyester (Dark Heather Grey, Heather Sea Green, Heather Peach).

-Super Soft
-True To Size, Retail Fit
-Machine Wash Cold or Warm, Inside Out, With Like Colors
-Tumble Dry Low or Air Dry
-DO NOT IRON DIRECTLY ON DESIGN

Medium: 20” / 29”

2XL: 26” / 32”


GILDAN 50/50

50% Cotton / 50% Polyester 5.6 Dryblend Shirt

-Loose Fitting Shirt
-Machine Wash Cold or Warm, Inside Out, With Like Colors
-Tumble Dry Low or Air Dry
-DO NOT IRON DIRECTLY ON DESIGN

Body Width and Length:

2XL: 26.5” / 32”

These tanks are fitted and run on the smaller side. If you are in-between sizes , we recommend that you go up a size. If you have any questions or concerns please send us a message.

Youth Size Shirts

Personalization Options:

We would absolutely love to help you recreate anything you have imagined to be on your shirt. Feel free to message us to see what we can do in terms of colors, adding text, removing text, or anything of the like. We can create a mock-up for you to ensure that you are satisfied before we bring the design to life.


Thank you again and we look forward to working with you!

We try our best to have orders shipped out as quickly as possible. If you request an item to be rush ordered, we will do our best to have it shipped out within 24 hours. No refunds will be issued if the order is not received in time. The items are custom made and we take great pride is ensuring that we're sending you the best possible product we can provide. Priority shipping can take 2-3 days depending on where you are in the country and we can not guarantee any delivery dates but do the best we can to prepare your item for you.

results.title: Mature - Punch Every F*cking Nazi - 5"x7" cross-stitch PATTERN - INSTANT DOWNLOAD .pdf
results.description:
IN THIS HOUSE, WE
laugh A LOT
love OFTEN &
punch EVERY
FUCKING NAZI WE SEE

This pattern was originally designed as a special request.  It's more a mantra than a quote, but it's one I think everyone can get behind.  

#TeamPunchaNazi

---> PLEASE NOTE: This listing is just for the digital file of the PATTERN. <---

* Full-color, printable, 2-page .pdf
* First page is a cover page with an image of the completed design 
* Second page is the actual pattern, with DMC floss key and additional info.
* Colors are listed with DMC floss numbers, but you can use whatever floss you like. 
* Designed to fit in a 5"x7" frame when stitched on 14 count Aida or a 4"x6" frame when stitched on 18 count Aida
* Designed to complement a heroic lifestyle

QUESTIONS? Want me to stitch it for you? I'd be happy to oblige! 
Please send me a message.

NEW POLICY: Once you've purchased a QuoteStitching pattern, you can feel free to stitch it for fun and/or profit, as long as you credit QuoteStitching for the design and direct all interested parties and inquiries to QuoteStitching.Etsy.com. 

Thank you for supporting QuoteStitching!

Many thanks to https://www.etsy.com/shop/RubyRoadVintageWares for inspiring this design - check out that shop (no connection to this one, other than being on #TeamPunchaNazi) for this quote on a plate.

Blog - QuoteStitching.WordPress.com
Instagram - @quotestitching
Twitter - @quotestitching

results.title: Inspiration Bundle | Believe-Live-Love-Laugh, PNG, Sublimation Design, Printable Digital File, and Instant Download
results.description:
Welcome to Bittersweet by Design Art Studio!!

This is an instant digital PNG file download - no physical product will be shipped!

With this purchase, you will receive (1 ) Zip file containing (4) PNG files at 300 dpi with watermarking removed.

PNG's are great for sublimation, creating greeting cards and framed artwork.  
For framed artwork: Print on a high quality card stock


**** Terms of Service  & Important Information ****
Please make sure you have the required software to use this graphic before making your purchase. Due to the nature of this product, refunds are not available on digital downloads.

Every effort has been made to represent the true colours of this file, however colour may vary slightly according to each monitor and printer settings.  For sublimation, keep in mind that any white within a design will sub transparent and will be the colour of the sublimation blank.  The colour of sublimation blank can also affect the final product coloration.

All designs purchased are licensed for personal/ commercial use (up to 100 prints).  For high-volume production (defined as more than 100 copies), please contact me to purchase an extended license.  

Purchased designs may not be modified, copied, distributed, shared or resold.
